#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}



int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
  /* your code here */
  return SubmitCommand(oid, "put", k, v);
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  return SubmitCommand(oid, "append", k, v);
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
  // v not used here, give empty string
  int err_code = SubmitCommand(oid, "get", k, string());
  if (err_code == KV_SUCCESS)
    *v = data_[k];
  return err_code;
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */
  uint64_t oid = static_cast<uint64_t>(stoul(v->data_[0]));
  const string& operate = v->data_[1];
  const string& opk = v->data_[2];
  const string& opv = v->data_[3];

  if (operate == "put")
    data_[opk] = opv;
  else if (operate == "append")
    data_[opk] += opv;
  else if (operate == "get") {}
    // do nothing to data
  else
    Log_warn("oid = %ld, unknown operate \"%s\"", oid, operate.c_str());
  Log_debug(
    "OnNextCommand: operate %lu %s(%s, %s). Now value is %s.", 
    oid, operate.c_str(), opk.c_str(), opv.c_str(), data_[opk].c_str()
  );

  auto it = pending_events_.find(oid);
  if (it != pending_events_.end()) {
    it->second->Set(1);
    pending_events_.erase(it);
  }
}

int KvServer::SubmitCommand(const uint64_t& oid,
                            const string& operate,
                            const string& k,
                            const string& v) {
  Log_debug(
    "SubmitCommand: operate %lu %s(%s, %s).", 
    oid, operate.c_str(), k.c_str(), v.c_str()
  );


  shared_ptr<MultiStringMarshallable> msm = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  msm->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  msm->data_.push_back(operate);
  msm->data_.push_back(k);
  msm->data_.push_back(v);
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> m = msm;
  shared_ptr<IntEvent> ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();

  auto it_ok_pair = pending_events_.insert({oid, ev});
  uint64_t index;
  uint64_t term;
  bool is_leader = GetRaftServer().Start(m, &index, &term);
  if (!is_leader) {
    pending_events_.erase(it_ok_pair.first);
    Log_debug("SubmitCommand: operate %lu end, err_code = KV_NOTLEADER", oid);
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  ev->Wait(KV_SERVER_TIMEOUT);
  if (ev->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT) {
    Log_debug("SubmitCommand: operate %lu end, err_code = KV_TIMEOUT", oid);
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  else {
    Log_debug("SubmitCommand: operate %lu end, err_code = KV_SUCCESS", oid);
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
}
//

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
